About 60 metres (approx) of the bundh at Padmapur Swadin Deuri to Mahendra Chuburi has been affected/washed away on 14-07-2021 due to the increasing water level in the Gabharu river.  The bundh is under the scheme of MGNERA ( Karunabari Development Block), Latitude 27.158796 & Longitude 93.891482
